headline: How Recent Street Shifts Are Rewriting The Story For PNC Financial Services Group (PNC)
summary: PNC Financial Services Group is back in focus after a fresh update to its fair value work, with the Fair Value Estimate moving from about US$220.93 to about US$236.12 and the Discount Rate edging from about 7.46% to about 7.43%. These changes reflect Street commentary that now incorporates different assumptions for revenue growth, net interest income and fee potential over 2025 to 2026, as well as how regional banks like PNC might trade compared with larger universal banks. Read on to see how...
